profile.name: Ashutosh Kolambkar
profile.aboutme: I am Front-end developer having more than 5 years of experience with technologies ReactJS, AngularJS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, MySQL, python Passionate programmer willing to share knowledge and learn any new technologies to solve problems.

roles_responsibilities.point: Engineered UI components in ReactJS and TypeScript, creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications.
Developed responsive and interactive web interfaces utilizing modern JavaScript and React.js to improve user engagement and functionality.
Collaborated with backend developers for seamless frontend-backend integration, providing a consistent and optimized user experience.
Technology Used: React, HTML, Reactstrap, SCSS, Git.
Developed and maintained responsive, high-performance web applications using React, Redux Toolkit, Context API, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, optimizing functionality across devices.
Enhanced web pages for mobile responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility to ensure uniform user experiences.
Collaborated with designers and backend teams to implement modular, scalable code, supporting the application’s performance and future adaptability.
Technology Used: Python, Flask, React, HTML, Reactstrap, SCSS, Git.
Collected requirements as per department needs and developed Social Media Monitoring Web Application for collecting complaints regarding offensive posts.

Included modules to generated automated letters/ reports/notices based on actions taken by the respective authority and dynamically change content as per the sections of India Penal Court criminal procedure code and IT Act.
Tested government websites for vulnerabilities and reported to the respective authorities with appropriate optimal solution for the same.
Developed an OSINT Tool called OsintORK for ease in digital investigation for authorities and help fraud online traces of reformation regarding the subject of the case.
Wrote python scripts for converting manual documents from PDF to CSV.
Testing reported for efficiency of reading 200 files per minute.
Technology Used: Html5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, Bootstrap 3, Bootstrap 4, MySQL, Python, Flask.
Built reusable PHP modules in OpenCart framework as per requirement. Collaborated with designers and software engineers to ensure the integrity of the product.
Technology Used: Html5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, Bootstrap 3, Bootstrap 4, MySQL, OpenCart
Site URL: https://ctctourism.com
